data.text:
About the Recreation Center

The City of Tallmadge Recreation Center is a 105,000 square-foot health, fitness, wellness and recreation center that serves the residents of the community by providing high-quality facilities and programs that enhance the quality of life for all. Truly an inter-generational facility, the Recreation Center serves all ages! The facility features a 1/5 mile indoor walking and jogging track, 100 pieces of strength and cardio equipment in a spacious second-floor fitness center, 4 full-sized basketball courts with 24 baskets, a full-sized indoor soccer field, a racquetball court, 2 group fitness studios, and one cycling studio. We offer a variety of sports programs and leagues as well as one of the largest varieties of group fitness classes that you will find anywhere. The benefits of the Tallmadge Recreation Center are endless. We encourage you and your entire family to stop by and give us a try!

Facility Age Restrictions

Facility Age Restrictions - Effective 1/1/19ActivityAge RestrictionTo Enter the FacilityChildren 12 and under must be accompanied by an adult (18 or older) to enter the facility.To Spectate a League, Tournament or ProgramChildren 12 and under must be accompanied by and seated with an adult (18 or older) when spectating a league, tournament or program.To Take Group Fitness ClassesChildren 13 and older may participate in group fitness classes without an adult present. Anyone taking a group fitness class must have a Gold or an equivalent level of membership. To Use Fitness Area/Racquetball Court/Four Corners of FitnessChildren 13 and older may use the fitness area/racquetball court/four corners of fitness without an adult present.

Children 10-12 must be accompanied by an adult (18 or older) to use the fitness area/racquetball court/four corners of fitness.

Children 9 and under are NOT permitted to use the fitness area/racquetball court/four corners of fitness. To Use Batting CagesChildren 12 and under must be directly supervised by an adult (18 or older) when using the batting cages. To Use TrackChildren 10 and older may use the track without an adult present.

Children 5-9 must be directly supervised by an adult (18 or older) while using the track.

Children 4 and under are NOT permitted to use the track unless the child is secured in a stroller and is accompanied by an adult (18 or older) To Use Basketball CourtsChildren 10 and older may use the basketball courts or soccer field without an adult present.

Children 9 and under must be directly supervised by an adult (18 or older) to use the basketball courts or soccer field. To Use Indoor PlaygroundChildren 1-12 may use the Indoor Playground Area. Playground must be staffed by a TRC employee. Additional fees may apply.

**All children (5 or older) using any part of the facility (other than the Indoor Playground Area when staffed by a TRC staff member) must have a valid youth membership**
